name: Cutthroats
overview: The game takes place in and around the fictional Hardscrabble Island, a struggling seaport village. The player protagonist is a diver who is given a map of two undiscovered shipwrecks. Various characters about the port help or hinder the player in their quest to retrieve treasure from the shipwrecks. The game randomly picks between two possible ships the objective of the adventure at run time. In addition to this unique characteristic, many of the characters in the game move about the map with a specific schedule, causing replays to vary based on what time other characters or situations are encountered.
